species.name: wugtrio
descriptions: A variety of fish Pokémon, Wugtrio was once considered to be a regional form of Dugtrio.
It has a vicious temperament, contrary to what its appearance may suggest. It wraps its long bodies around prey, then drags the prey into its den.

abilities.name: gooey
abilities.effect: Lowers attacking Pokémon's Speed by one stage on contact.

abilities.name: rattled
abilities.effect: Raises Speed one stage upon being hit by a dark, ghost, or bug move.

abilities.name: sand-veil
abilities.effect: Increases evasion to 1.25× during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.
